reviews.review_text: I cancelled my order in less than 5 minutes of submission. Order was not cancelled. I order 6 two packs of the SheaMoisture frankincense and myrrh raw shea butter soap bar and was subsequently given 12 substitute of single bars of plain shea butter without frankincense and myrrh even after I cancelled my order in less than 5 minutes.
I thought it would smell milder, smells more of a male fragrance maybe not old spice, but brut. The color is like that a green tone.i I thought it would be light beige, camal. Gentle to skin.
Moisturizes the skin...Like that there aren't any caustic ingredients...Even used it for washing my hair....
I've used the soap for years. I just couldn't believe that you all had only one in stock to order.
I have bad skin. This soap will get me clean and smell good with no additional problems with my skin.

reviews.title: Shea moisture soap
reviews.review_text: It cleaned my face really well but afterwards my skin would be very oily.

reviews.title: Maybe you'll like it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Not a super big fan of soap bars I don't like how they seem to dry my skin out. And this one was no different. It smells good. And at first it seemed like it was gonna be a different experience but it wasn't. Some may like it but it's not for me.

reviews.title: Moisture-rich shea butter
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used to find a lot of bar soaps to be drying. I was skeptical about the moisturizing properties of this bar soap, but immediately after showering that evening, my skin felt soft and smooth. It has a distinct smell, not bad but in a way that made me think there wasn't any additional fragrance added. According to the ingredients list, there is a bit of fragrance. It also has a nice lather to it. Overall I like it and am excited to keep using.

reviews.title: Price it has risen
reviews.review_text: I've used this brand of soap for 15 year's. But at the price it has risen I will purchase the local goat milk soap.
I was unable to find SM at any of the retail stores near my home, so I went online to Walmart.com and you all had just what I was looking for.

reviews.title: Never been a bar soap person
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Ok so I have never been a bar soap person because it usually leaves my far or with a weird film. But this is actually quite nice. It has a very pleasant smell.

reviews.title: Kind of drying
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It smells really nice and says it is for dry skin, but it is a bit drying. It reminds me more of their black soap than a shea butter based soap. I may use it for hand washing instead of body soap.

reviews.title: it smells nice....
reviews.review_text: I like a soap that doesnt smell super feminine so this definitely has that covered, its a very light scent. It says is supposed to be moisturizing but my skin feels incredibly dry after using it. I dont know that Id want to use it again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

reviews.title: Raw Shea Butter Soap
reviews.review_text: I suffer from really bad acne. Started using the soap on my face only May 11th and it's now May 14th. Face already clearing up. I can see and feel a difference on my skin. My go to soap.
